document_data.caption: An [[avoral]] and a leonal.
document_data.name: Leonal
document_data.mainbody: '''Leonals''' were the mightiest kind of [[guardinal]]. They lived in [[Elysium]] and the [[House of Nature]].<ref>
document_data.Description: Leonals resembled muscular, humanoid lions of regal appearance.
document_data.Abilities: Leonals had a variety of spell-like abilities and were incredibly fast and agile.
document_data.Society: [[Talisid]] the Celestial Lion was the [[Talisid and the Five Companions|leader]] of both the leonals and all the guardinals.<ref> However, some leonals would serve [[Mystra]] on occasion.<ref>{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|13}}
document_data.History: Around [[1373 DR]], a leonal was roaming [[the Shaar]].
